titles.title: GIS Emergency Response Technology Sustainment Act of 2023
GIS Emergency Response Technology Sustainment Act of 2023

To authorize annual appropriations to the Geospatial Management Office of the Department of Homeland Security for the sustainment of innovative GIS technologies to improve emergency response capabilities, and for other purposes.
